EmailTemplate.description: what you get and what you don't for ex-subs generic
EmailTemplate.name: Ex subs promo benefts table
EmailTemplate.subject: What you get | What you're missing
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Sure, you get limited updates and event announcements, but there's a whole lot you're missing by not subscribing:
Free benefits: ✓ Event of the Week alerts ✓ Thought Leadership downloads ✓ Live weekly CPE webcasts
What you're missing by not subscribing: ✓ Unlimited access to award-winning subscriber-only content ✓ Monthly print issue ✓ Access to the digital edition archive ✓ Dozens of On-Demand CPE Library webcasts ✓ Discounts to Compliance Week events ✓ My CW—pinning and sharing ✓ Access to the Resource Center databases ✓ Tuesday's Compliance Week eNewsletter ✓ Weekend Edition's "plain English" digest
Subscribe for less than $16 per week.
"Compliance Week does an outstanding job of distilling complex issues into concise articles to meet my needs. It helps... in an era of over-communication via e-mail and social media, I find Compliance Week to be an invaluable tool that provides thoughtful insight on emerging issues." Vice President Internal Audit, RLI Corp.
